issue.title: [C++] File system API should expand paths
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6324](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6324). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See ARROW-6323

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6324?focusedCommentId=16916747) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Some possibilities:
- do it implicitly in LocalFileSystem
- do it explicitly in a dedicated convenience API
- do it explicitly in a generic path conversion layer (that could also do other things, e.g. strip trailing slashes on S3)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6324?focusedCommentId=16933799) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Also windows backslashes (ARROW-6622)
